  • Method Details

    • setGods

      public void setGods​(java.lang.Object listOfGods)
      Used to set on screen corresponding God's card in listOfGods. If there aren't enough gods to fill spaces, then spaces remain with their original background.
      Parameters:
      listOfGods - list of strings with name of gods received from ViewManager

    • setImageGodCard

      public void setImageGodCard​(java.lang.String godName, int cardNum)
      Used to set image for god's cards.
      Parameters:
      godName - name for the linked image
      cardNum - number of the card to set

    • sendCardChosen

      public void sendCardChosen​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Used to save card selection.
      Parameters:
      event - click on the corresponding card

    • description

      public void description​(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent event)
      Used to see card's description when event is verified.
      Parameters:
      event - mouse entered

    • image

      public void image​(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent event)
      Used to see card when event is verified.
      Parameters:
      event - mouse exited

    • setChangingGodCard

      public void setChangingGodCard​(java.lang.String godName, int cardNum, java.lang.String action)
      Method that allows, during the choice of the divinity, the display of the God card if the mouse is not on the card, otherwise it shows the relative description.
      Parameters:
      godName - String containing God's name
      cardNum - int
      action - ("image" if the mouse is not on the card, "description" otherwise)

    • informManagerInput

      public void informManagerInput​(java.lang.String input)
      Used to inform ViewManager (observer) about a GUI choice done by Client.
      Specified by:
      informManagerInput in interface GuiObservable
      Parameters:
      input - choice done
